#MyWeekendDram It had to be something from the beautiful Ardnahoe Distillery to celebrate their victory in the Best Product Launch category at Thursday's Scottish Whisky Awards. I was delighted to work closely with Jennifer Tait on the submission and although the dram I savoured is not the winning Inaugural Release - it is nonetheless magnificent.

#IslayWhisky #BestProductLaunch Andrew Laing Hunter Laing & Co Ltd. Scott Laing
